snippet: Mr. Moldoff received belated recognition for drawing some of the most recognizable superheroes of comic books’ golden age, including characters for Batman.
abstract: Sheldon Moldoff, artist who drew some of the most recognizable superheroes of the golden age of comic books without receiving recognition in his own right for decades, dies at age 91.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Moldoff received belated recognition for drawing some of the most recognizable superheroes of comic books’ golden age, including characters for Batman.

headline.main: Sheldon Moldoff, Batman Comic Book Artist, Dies at 91
headline.print_headline: Sheldon Moldoff, 91, Artist in Golden Era of Comic Books
